verses.verse: In the eighth<WH8066> month,<WH2320> in the second<WH8147> year<WH8141> of Darius,<WH1867> the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to Zechariah<WH2148> the son<WH1121> of Berechiah,<WH1296> the son<WH1121> of Iddo,<WH5714> the prophet,<WH5030> saying,<WH559>
"Yahweh<WH3068> was very<WH7110> displeased<WH7107> with your fathers.<WH1>

Your fathers,<WH1> where are they?<WH5030> And the prophets, do they live<WH2421> forever?<WH5769>

But my words<WH1697> and my decrees,<WH2706> which I commanded<WH6680> my servants<WH5650> the prophets,<WH5030> didn't<WH5381> they overtake your fathers?<WH1> "Then they repented<WH7725> and said,<WH559> <WH3068> 'Just as Yahweh of Armies<WH6635> determined<WH2161> to do<WH6213> to us,<WH1870> according to our ways, and according to our practices,<WH4611> so he has dealt with us.<WH6213>'"

On the twenty<WH6242> - fourth<WH702> day<WH3117> of the eleventh<WH6249> month,<WH2320> which is the month<WH2320> Shebat,<WH7627> in the second<WH8147> year<WH8141> of Darius,<WH1867> the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to Zechariah<WH2148> the son<WH1121> of Berechiah,<WH1296> the son<WH1121> of Iddo,<WH5714> the prophet,<WH5030> saying,<WH559>

"I had a vision<WH7200> in the night,<WH3915> and behold,<WH376> a man riding<WH7392> on a red<WH122> horse,<WH5483> and he stood<WH5975> among the myrtle trees<WH1918> that were in a ravine;<WH4699> and behind<WH310> him there were red,<WH122> brown,<WH8320> and white<WH3836> horses.<WH5483>
Then I asked,<WH559> <WH113> 'My lord, what are these?<WH4397>'" The angel who talked<WH1696> with me said<WH559> to me,<WH7200> "I will show you what these are."
The man<WH376> who stood<WH5975> among the myrtle trees<WH1918> answered,<WH6030> "They are the ones Yahweh<WH3068> has sent<WH7971> to go<WH1980> back and forth through the earth.<WH776>"

They reported<WH6030> to the angel<WH4397> of Yahweh<WH3068> who stood<WH5975> among the myrtle trees,<WH1918> and said,<WH559> "We have walked back and forth<WH1980> through the earth,<WH776> and behold,<WH776> all the earth is at rest<WH3427> and in peace.<WH8252>"

Then the angel<WH4397> of Yahweh<WH3068> replied,<WH6030> "O Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> how long will you not have mercy<WH7355> on Jerusalem<WH3389> and on the cities<WH5892> of Judah,<WH3063> against which you have had indignation<WH2194> these seventy<WH7657> years?<WH8141>"
Yahweh<WH3068> answered<WH6030> the angel<WH4397> who talked<WH1696> with me with kind<WH2896> and comforting<WH5150> words.<WH1697>

So the angel<WH4397> who talked<WH1696> with me said<WH559> to me,<WH7121> "Proclaim, saying,<WH559> <WH559> 'Thus says Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies:<WH6635> "I am jealous<WH7065> for Jerusalem<WH3389> and for Zion<WH6726> with a great<WH1419> jealousy.<WH7068>
I am very<WH1419> <WH7110> angry<WH7107> with the nations<WH1471> that are at ease;<WH7600> for I was but a little<WH4592> displeased,<WH7107> but they added<WH5826> to the calamity.<WH7451>"

Therefore thus says<WH559> Yahweh:<WH3068> "I have returned<WH7725> to Jerusalem<WH3389> with mercy.<WH7356> My house<WH1004> shall be built<WH1129> in it,<WH5002>" says Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> "and a line<WH6957> shall be stretched forth<WH5186> over Jerusalem.<WH3389>"'

"Proclaim<WH7121> further,<WH559> saying, <WH559> 'Thus says Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies:<WH6635> "My cities<WH5892> will again overflow<WH6327> with prosperity,<WH2896> and Yahweh<WH3068> will again comfort<WH5162> Zion,<WH6726> and will again choose<WH977> Jerusalem.<WH3389>"'"
I lifted up<WH5375> my eyes,<WH5869> and saw,<WH7200> and behold,<WH702> four horns.<WH7161>

I asked<WH559> the angel<WH4397> who talked<WH1696> with me,<WH559> "What are these?" He answered me,<WH7161> "These are the horns which have scattered<WH2219> Judah,<WH3063> Israel,<WH3478> and Jerusalem.<WH3389>"
Yahweh<WH3068> showed<WH7200> me four<WH702> craftsmen.<WH2796>

Then I asked,<WH559> "What are these coming<WH935> to do?<WH6213>" He said,<WH559> "These are the horns<WH7161> which scattered<WH2219> Judah,<WH3063> so that<WH6310> no man<WH376> lifted up<WH5375> his head;<WH7218> but these have come<WH935> to terrify<WH2729> them,<WH3034> to cast down the horns<WH7161> of the nations,<WH1471> which lifted up<WH5375> their horn<WH7161> against the land<WH776> of Judah<WH3063> to scatter it.<WH2219>"
